# Contributing to Nukat

Thank you for your interest in contributing to Nukat!

Please see our [Contributing Guide](docs/contributing.md) for detailed instructions on:

- Setting up the development environment
- Running tests and quality checks
- Coding standards
- Pull request process
- Development workflow

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone and setup
git clone https://github.com/kupolak/nukat.git
cd nukat
pip install -e ".[dev]"

# Run tests
pytest

# Format code
black nukat tests

# Lint
ruff check nukat tests
```
